client-settings.name: 株式会社ジュピターテレコム

extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:auto !important; height:44px; /* position: fixed; */ top:0;}#site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height: 12px;}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell; height:44px; vertical-align:middle; width:5000px;} #mapBox .kanto, #mapBox .kansai, #mapBox .kyushu { width: 250px; } #mapBox .areaBtn { width: 115px; } #mapBox .chugoku, #mapBox .kyushu { left: 43px } .c-btn__xs a { padding: 8px 10px; }
